mapper.sql: trade_no, out_trade_no, create_time, pay_time, update_time, trade_source, type, seller, product, amount, income_expenditure, trade_status, service_money, refund, memo, fund_status
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT( pay_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) date, sum( IF ( income_expenditure = '支出', amount, 0 )) expenditure, sum( IF ( income_expenditure = '收入', amount, 0 )) income FROM alipay_transaction_record GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( pay_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT( pay_time, '%Y-%m-%d' )

SELECT date_format( pay_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) pay_time, fund_status, sum( amount ) FROM alipay_transaction_record GROUP BY date_format( pay_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ), fund_status ORDER BY date_format( pay_time, '%Y-%m-%d' )
SELECT IFNULL( sum( amount ), 0 ) total FROM alipay_transaction_record WHERE DATE_FORMAT( pay_time, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y%m') AND income_expenditure = '支出'
